dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement on Behalf of RockPort Capital Partners
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Isbell, Kimberley A. [mailto:KAIsbell@HHLAW.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 27, 2006 4:53 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; gpoletes@theplanet.com
Cc: Kurz, Raymond A.
Subject: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement on Behalf of
RockPort Capital Partners II, LP



Dear Mr. Poletes: 

The attached is sent on behalf of Raymond A. Kurz, further to your
conversation earlier this afternoon. Please let us know if you need anything
further from us.

Regards, 

Kimberley A. Isbell 
Hogan & Hartson L.L.P. 
555 Thirteenth Street, NW 
Washington, D.C. 20004 
202-637-8875 (direct) 
202-637-5910 (fax) 
kaisbell@hhlaw.com 

<<DOC172.PDF>> 

This electronic message transmission contains information from this law firm
which may be confidential or privileged. The information is intended to be
for the use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the
intended recipient, be aware that any disclosure, copying, distribution or
use of the contents of this information is prohibited.

If you have received this electronic transmission in error, please notify us
by telephone (+1-202-637-5600) or by electronic mail (PostMaster@HHLAW.COM)
immediately.
